member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BrightnessEffect
member.summary: Alters the brightness of an image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Brightness effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BrightnessEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BrightnessEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BrightnessEffect.WhitePoint
member.summary: Sets the white point of the brightness transfer curve. This controls the appearance of lighter parts of the image. Default value (1,1).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BrightnessEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Brightness effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BrightnessEffect.BlackPoint
member.summary: Sets the black point of the brightness transfer curve. This controls the appearance of darker parts of the image. Default value (0,0).
